mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notifications(user_id, sender_id, title, message, type, target_url) VALUES (#{userId}, #{senderId}, #{title}, #{message}, #{type}, #{targetUrl});
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, sender_id AS senderId, title, message, type, target_url AS targetUrl, create_at AS createAt, read_at AS readAt, is_read AS isRead FROM notifications WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE notifications SET read_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, is_read = true WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_read = false;
